body:
Hello,

Michael has been reassessed by the administrators, senior moderators, moderators, and junior moderators alike to be promoted to senior moderator. Michael, known as Newcleus, will be taking charge to help repair the staff team's problems and to improve how TeamSpeak currently runs. His goals are clear to provide a better server, and we trust him to also perform well in both aspects of staff and community: Being active on TeamSpeak, and working closely with the staff, while contributing to documents and giving feedback, we have assumed his return as a 2 week senior moderator trial.

As what with the reaction that may ensue, I request that all of you not assemble in hate to disrespect the staff further. We hope that this takes a step in the right direction. As well as this, I'd like to also mention the community slack so you can talk more about his position.

Well wishes to him and his position.
body_tagged:
Hello,

Michael has been reassessed by the administrators, senior moderators, moderators, and junior moderators alike to be promoted to senior moderator. Michael, known as Newcleus, will be taking charge to help repair the staff team's problems and to improve how TeamSpeak currently runs. His goals are clear to provide a better server, and we trust him to also perform well in both aspects of staff and community: Being active on TeamSpeak, and working closely with the staff, while contributing to documents and giving feedback, we have assumed his return as a 2 week senior moderator trial.

As what with the reaction that may ensue, I request that all of you not assemble in hate to disrespect the staff further. We hope that this takes a step in the right direction. As well as this, I'd like to also mention the community slack so you can talk more about his position.

Well wishes to him and his position.
title: Michael's Return as Senior Mod

replies.body:
Okay... so one of the most toxic members of the community get's back a staff position after all that has been done.

I am willing... to trust the decision of the staff... despite it being unwise...

You guys have your reasons. However, I'd recommend putting him in a Jr.Mod position since during his retirement he was - and is - toxic. Since he was acting out, I - and many others - believe that it would be fair if he restarted from the bottom.

If I get my ranks taken for acting out, so should everyone else. It's only fair guys. (Not that I'm angry, I found my demotion to be justified as a matter of fact. But for someone who retired and then went on to act out - it's very unfair to me and all those who received the same treatment as me.)

replies.body:
Ok let's stop this before it becomes a big issue. There are 2 groups so this will be easy to solve.
Group A who is upset with Micheal. Just see how this goes and if you have any complaints remember that he isn't the highest group of staff. The admins are not blinded so if you have anything that proves Micheal to not be in the actions of a Sr Mod or what it should be, you can talk to the admins about this and they will look into it. 
Group B who dafuq you are. People have the right not to be amazed with Micheal. I myself am not but I talked to Micheal about this. You "defending" him is doing more harm then anything. He can talk to the people that don't trust him and he can deal with them. You are putting more problems then there should be.
Both groups become adults and work something out. Stupid flame wars do nothing if you haven't noticed.

Michael has been 1 of the most toxic members in the community, made DDoS threats and made pel retire. Some staff think it is alright to promote him after 3 months he is toxic and 1 day he is nice. That is ridiculous and you promoted him to SR MOD not JR MOD.

Positives?

Michael did work sufficiently with his Admin role and did get things done. No more Mr. Toxic Michael


My point of view; I don't agree with the decision

replies.body:
For the record: 13 Staff Members were allegedly involved in the discussion (Vice told me). Only two of which were Senior Staff Members (Not even both Admins were involved). No vote outside of the discussion counted. I, for one, disagree with the decision. 


I am sorry if this annoys any staff members, but our new goal is "Transparency", and I am just telling the truth.


Good luck

replies.body:
Okay,

I completely see where you are all coming from, when you are saying that you don't want Michael as senior moderator. I myself didn't agree with it at the beginning, alright? I talked to him through teamspeak along with other moderators, and he cleared up questions that we had, and in the end we ALL agreed that a second chance giving a second chance to Michael could provide benefit to the staff team and the community.

As Javi stated, this is a congratulations thread to Michael, if you feel you don't agree with this promotion, feel free to go and chat with him, thanks.

replies.body:
Ok, so reading through the replys on the post is pretty much reading .
"Michael is a cheeky Wombat"

I see were every single one of you are coming from. I know he's a cheeky cunt (mind my French) but like jeez give the man a chance...

He did amazing work for Avicus before when he was staff and he was a great guy to joke around and talk to.

So I don't see why he deserves all this hate for stuff that has happened in the past like let it go because I believe Michael can really help Avicus and shape it into an even better place. Like this is the same as when Iron got promoted back to mod like everyone I talked to seemed pissed about it because they think Iron is toxic and an ass sometimes but like c'mon.

How many mods that have done great for Avicus but were toxic and were a pain in the ass?

So please give Michelle (Banter :p) chance before you Bitch him out ok?

Ok I'm done I'll leave it up to you guys to figure what the hell your gonna do.

replies.body:
I know at least one of the senior staff was away during the meeting and at least 3 of the mods weren't present. 

Anyways, @Michael, sorry for my poor behaviour, that was pretty sad on my part and I should really hold myself to higher standards than that. Though I don't trust you fully yet, you seem to have the drive and will to make Avicus a better place and I wish you the best of luck man :). Thanks for understanding. I got rather caught up in the past, which I sincerely apologize for, I have no place to act in such a rude manner.

replies.body:
Time for my opinion.

Yes, I was in the meeting in which we voted for the promotion of Michael.
I voted yes because he had good points but under the condition which I did say when we voted "Yes, as long as he gets a 2 week moderator trial first".

This didn't happen, which is why I disagree with the promotion.

2 weeks ago he made Pel retire, now he is back and a senior....

Anyway, no hate to anybody, this is my opinion.

Anyway, no hate to anybody, this is my opinion.

This thread which what i think was just an announcement thread, it ended up being full with people who are flaming, almost ''crying'' that one person that got ''re-added'' to the staff team. If it should have been any ''flame war'' (which it shouldn't, just an example) it should have been towards the guy(s) whom threatened Pel so bad that he decided to immediately step down from Administrator. 

It can't go on like this..
